text: Amazon consistently offers some of the best deals on Apple products, and this week is no exception. Check out some fantastic deals on the all new AirPods 4, AirPods Pro 2, Apple Watch Series 10, MacBook Air in 13″ and 15″ screen sizes, and a 4-pack of AirTags. AirPods 4 – $99 (down from $129) AirPods 4 are wildly popular wireless headphones for good reason, with gesture support, personalized Spatial Audio, voice isolation, water resistance, great battery life, and USB-C charging. Get AirPods 4 for $99 (down 22% from $129) AirPods Pro 2 – $169 (down from $249) AirPods Pro 2 are even fancier AirPods with more advanced features like hear aid functionality, Active Noice Cancellation, high fidelity sound, personalized Spatial Audio, water resistance and sweat resistance, customizable fit, transparency mode for ambient sounds, Siri commands, ear detection, great battery life, and USB-C charging. AirPods Pro 2 – $169 (down from $249) Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399) Apple Watch Series 10 is a fantastic water resistant fitness and activity tracker with an always-on 42mm display, heart rate monitor, pedometer functionality, ECG functionality, crash detection, fall detection with Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support, voice control, all day battery life, and more. Enjoy a great discount from Amazon, and pick the color and band size option that you like the best. Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (down from $399 MSRP) M3 MacBook Air 13″ & 15″ for $200 Off Retail The MacBook Air series is available in 13″ and 15″ screen sizes, feature the powerful M3 processor with Apple Intelligcen support, offer great battery life, a center-stage front camera, 16GB RAM standard, and is available in a variety of color options to suit your preference. Why pay full price when you can get a great $200 discount? 13″ MacBook Air M3 13″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 256GB SSD – $899 (down $200 from $1099) 13″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 512GB SSD – $1099 (down from $1299) 13″ MacBook Air M3 – 24GB / 512GB SSD – $1299 (down $200 from $1499) 15″ MacBook Air M3 15″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 256GB SSD – $1099 (down $200 from $1299) 15″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 512GB SSD – $1299 (down $200 from $1499) 15″ MacBook Air M3 – 24GB RAM / 512GB SSD – $1499 (down $200 from $1699) AirTags 4-pack – $70 (down from $99) AirTag personal trackers offer a convenient and easy way to keep watch on things like your backpack, luggage, personal belongings, even a dog or pet, bike, car, or just about anything else. The retail price is $99, but you can get a 4-pack for $69.99 right now from Amazon. AirTags – 4-pack – $69.99 (down from $99) FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
html:
Amazon consistently offers some of the best deals on Apple products, and this week is no exception. Check out some fantastic deals on the all new AirPods 4, AirPods Pro 2, Apple Watch Series 10, MacBook Air in 13″ and 15″ screen sizes, and a 4-pack of AirTags.

AirPods 4 – $99 (down from $129)

AirPods 4 are wildly popular wireless headphones for good reason, with gesture support, personalized Spatial Audio, voice isolation, water resistance, great battery life, and USB-C charging.

  • Get AirPods 4 for $99 (down 22% from $129)

AirPods Pro 2 – $169 (down from $249)

AirPods Pro 2 are even fancier AirPods with more advanced features like hear aid functionality, Active Noice Cancellation, high fidelity sound, personalized Spatial Audio, water resistance and sweat resistance, customizable fit, transparency mode for ambient sounds, Siri commands, ear detection, great battery life, and USB-C charging.

  • AirPods Pro 2 – $169 (down from $249)

Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399)

Apple Watch Series 10 is a fantastic water resistant fitness and activity tracker with an always-on 42mm display, heart rate monitor, pedometer functionality, ECG functionality, crash detection, fall detection with Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support, voice control, all day battery life, and more. Enjoy a great discount from Amazon, and pick the color and band size option that you like the best.

  • Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (down from $399 MSRP)

M3 MacBook Air 13″ & 15″ for $200 Off Retail

The MacBook Air series is available in 13″ and 15″ screen sizes, feature the powerful M3 processor with Apple Intelligcen support, offer great battery life, a center-stage front camera, 16GB RAM standard, and is available in a variety of color options to suit your preference. Why pay full price when you can get a great $200 discount?

13″ MacBook Air M3

  • 13″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 256GB SSD – $899 (down $200 from $1099)
  • 13″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 512GB SSD – $1099 (down from $1299)
  • 13″ MacBook Air M3 – 24GB / 512GB SSD – $1299 (down $200 from $1499)

15″ MacBook Air M3

  • 15″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 256GB SSD – $1099 (down $200 from $1299)
  • 15″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 512GB SSD – $1299 (down $200 from $1499)
  • 15″ MacBook Air M3 – 24GB RAM / 512GB SSD – $1499 (down $200 from $1699)

AirTags 4-pack – $70 (down from $99)

AirTag personal trackers offer a convenient and easy way to keep watch on things like your backpack, luggage, personal belongings, even a dog or pet, bike, car, or just about anything else. The retail price is $99, but you can get a 4-pack for $69.99 right now from Amazon.

  • AirTags – 4-pack – $69.99 (down from $99)

FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
